SCRIPT.MSCRI: : SET &ACTOBJ# = ACTIVATE_UC_OBJECT(&UC4RB_OPS_OBJECT_TYPE#,WAIT,,,,PASS_VALUES) : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,&ACTOBJ#,"RETCODE") : IF &STATUS# <> "0" : STOP MSG, 50, "Error while executing &UC4RB_OPS_OBJECT_TYPE# object " : ENDIF : IF &ACTOBJ# = "0" : SET &ERRNR# = SYS_LAST_ERR_NR() : SET &ERRINS# = SYS_LAST_ERR_INS() : SET &MESSAGE# = GET_MSG_TXT(&ERRNR#,&ERRINS#) : PRINT "Error while activating check server status object :&MESSAGE#" : STOP MSG, 50, "Error while activating &UC4RB_OPS_OBJECT_TYPE# object :&MESSAGE#" : ENDIF
